docstring.long_description: The data is returned as a dataframe with one column containing the text and the other containing the category.
docstring.short_description: Load one of the 20 newsgroup sample datasets from scikit-learn.

parameters.name: subset
parameters.description: Select the dataset to load: "train" for the training set, "test" for the test set, "all" for both.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description:
Select the categories to load. By default, all categories are loaded.
The list of all categories is:
'alt.atheism',
'comp.graphics',
'comp.os.ms-windows.misc',
'comp.sys.ibm.pc.hardware',
'comp.sys.mac.hardware',
'comp.windows.x',
'misc.forsale',
'rec.autos',
'rec.motorcycles',
'rec.sport.baseball',
'rec.sport.hockey',
'sci.crypt',
'sci.electronics',
'sci.med',
'sci.space',
'soc.religion.christian',
'talk.politics.guns',
'talk.politics.mideast',
'talk.politics.misc',
'talk.religion.misc'

parameters.name: remove_headers
parameters.description: Remove the headers from the data.

parameters.name: remove_footers
parameters.description: Remove the footers from the data.

parameters.name: remove_quotes
parameters.description: Remove the quotes from the data.
